Class KinesisEventJsonSerializerContext

Namespace
Innovt.Cloud.AWS.Lambda.Kinesis.Serializers
Assembly
Innovt.Cloud.AWS.Lambda.Kinesis.dll

Represents a JSON serializer context for Kinesis events.

[JsonSerializable(typeof(KinesisEvent))]
[JsonSerializable(typeof(BatchFailureResponse))]
public class KinesisEventJsonSerializerContext : JsonSerializerContext, IJsonTypeInfoResolver
